Structs/PassSigner.html#/s:11PassEncoder.name: appleWWDRCertURL
Structs/PassSigner.html#/s:11PassEncoder.abstract: The local URL of the Apple Worldwide Developer Relations Root Certificate Authority (required to sign passes).

Structs/PassSigner.html#/s:11PassEncoder.name: openSSLURL
Structs/PassSigner.html#/s:11PassEncoder.abstract: The URL to your OpenSSL binary. Set it if yours is in a different location than /usr/bin/openssl.

Structs/PassSigner.html#/s:11PassEncoder.name: SigningInfo
Structs/PassSigner.html#/s:11PassEncoder.abstract: A tuple representing a certificate URL (expected .pem) and password.

Structs/PassSigner.html.name: PassSigner
Structs/PassSigner.html.abstract: A singleton class used to sign PassKit passes.

Classes/PassEncoder.html#/s:11PassEncode.name: init(passData:)
Classes/PassEncoder.html#/s:11PassEncode.abstract: Intiialize the encoder with the provided pass.json data. Will return nil if an error occurs.

Classes/PassEncoder.html#/s:11PassEncode.name: init(passDataURL:)
Classes/PassEncoder.html#/s:11PassEncode.abstract: Intiialize the encoder with the provided pass.json URL. Will return nil if an error occurs.

Classes/PassEncoder.html#/s:11PassEncode.name: deinit
Classes/PassEncoder.html#/s:11PassEncode.abstract: Called when deinitializing the encoder. Used to remove our temporary directory.

Classes/PassEncoder.html#/s:11PassEncode.name: addFile(from:customName:)
Classes/PassEncoder.html#/s:11PassEncode.abstract: Add the file at the provided URL to the pass.

Classes/PassEncoder.html#/s:11PassEncode.name: addFile(named:from:)
Classes/PassEncoder.html#/s:11PassEncode.abstract: Add a file with the provided data to the pass with the provided name.

Classes/PassEncoder.html#/s:11PassEncode.name: encode(signingInfo:)
Classes/PassEncoder.html#/s:11PassEncode.abstract: Perform the encoding process and return the signed and archived pass as Data.

Classes/PassEncoder.html.name: PassEncoder
Classes/PassEncoder.html.abstract: A class used to encode PassKit passes.
